description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of rear dormer roof extension and installation of 3no.x front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: Approve tree surgery work.

The declaration section in the application form is signed by a different person, please amend the whole application form with correct names or please confirm 'Arron Twamley' works in same organisation.
